Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 2592 (MIC=1 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=5 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027 (MIC=5 µM).Yeast:Candida albicans ATCC 2002 (MIC=3 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Molecular Cloning and Functional Characterization of Novel Antimicrobial Peptides from the Skin of Brown Frog, Rana zhenhaiensis.
Literature.Author: Xu B, Che H, Kang L, Zheng S, Mu S, Wan F.
